channel.title: Calvin Seminary – The Bavinck Institute
channel.description: Reformed catholic theology in the tradition of Herman and J. H. Bavinck

item.title: 2011 Bavinck Conference Schedule
item.dc:creator: laurence
item.description: We have added a new page dedicated to the upcoming 12–14 October 2011 international Bavinck conference at Calvin Seminary. The list of speakers and conference schedule have been posted, and further information regarding conference registration, accommodations, etc., will be added as soon as the details are finalized.
item.content:encoded: We have added a new page dedicated to the upcoming 12–14 October 2011 international Bavinck conference at Calvin Seminary. The list of speakers and conference schedule have been posted, and further information regarding conference registration, accommodations, etc., will be added as soon as the details are finalized.
